Articles.Content:
The SXT mod has an Engine called "Lancer" which is basically four Rapiers rolled into on 2.5m part. It has no exhaust (neither fire nor smoke). Trial and error got me nowhere; eventually I copied everything over from the Rapier config, with mixed results: now I have fire (too small, of course)  but still no smoke.

I guess I'm not the first to struggle with this -- is there a good write-up somewhere?
